title: Add HomePage component with hero, features grid, and navigation
description: Created polished HomePage component with: fixed navigation bar with mobile menu support, hero section with title/subtitle/CTA buttons/stats, features grid showing 6 documentation portal capabilities, CTA section and footer. Updated App.tsx and index.css to use Tailwind.

title: Add Search component with filtering, highlighting, and keyboard navigation
description: Implements BEAD-004: Search component with real-time filtering, text highlighting, and keyboard navigation. Features include arrow key navigation, Enter to select, Escape to close, accessibility support, and dark mode compatibility.
reviewComments: Excellent search component. Well-typed TypeScript, proper keyboard navigation, ARIA accessibility, dark mode support. Regex properly escaped to prevent ReDoS. No security issues. Build passes.
buildOutput: Build successful: 32 modules transformed. Built in 982ms

title: feat: Add DocPage component with markdown rendering and navigation
description: Created DocPage component with react-markdown for content rendering, collapsible sidebar navigation for doc sections, auto-generated table of contents from headings, scroll spy for active TOC highlighting, and CSS variables for theming.
reviewComments: Code review passed. Well-structured DocPage component with markdown rendering, sidebar nav, scroll spy TOC. Adds react-markdown, remark-gfm, rehype-slug dependencies correctly. Build passes (291 modules, 1.57s). NOTE: Conflicts with MR-001 - both modify App.tsx and index.css. Needs rebase/integration after MR-001 merges.
buildOutput: Build successful: 291 modules transformed. Built in 1.57s

title: Implement theme system with light/dark mode
description: Add complete theme system with CSS variables, ThemeContext, ThemeToggle component. Supports light/dark mode with localStorage persistence and system preference detection.
reviewComments: Excellent theme system. Well-typed React Context with localStorage persistence, system preference detection, smooth transitions. Comprehensive CSS variables for light/dark modes. Good accessibility on toggle button. Build passes.
buildOutput: Build successful: 34 modules transformed. Built in 1.09s
